trans-unit.source: Represents XML metadata or references to XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Representa o XML de metadados ou referências aos metadados XML.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSection class conforms to the definition of the `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` element in the WS-Metadata Exchange specification and contains XML metadata or references to XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MetadataSection está em conformidade com a definição do `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` elemento na especificação WS-intercâmbio e contém metadados XML ou referências aos metadados XML.

trans-unit.source: A MetadataSection object contains one dialect of metadata in XML form (such as a Web Services Description Language or WSDL file).
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de MetadataSection contém um dialeto de metadados no formato XML (por exemplo, um ficheiro de linguagem de descrição de serviços Web ou WSDL).

trans-unit.source: You can add a MetadataSection to a collection of XML metadata represented by a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um MetadataSection a uma coleção de metadados XML representado por um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Much of the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] metadata system, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient> class, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class to import or export service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Uma grande parte a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sistema metadados, tais como o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>classe, utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>classe para importar ou exportar metadados de serviço no formato XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>

trans-unit.source: For example, to export [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] contract or endpoint objects to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object that contains the equivalent metadata in XML form, call the appropriate Export methods on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> class, passing either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects, and then call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para exportar [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] contrato ou o ponto final de objetos para um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objeto que contém os metadados equivalente no formulário XML, chamar os métodos de exportação adequados a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>classe, transmitir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>objetos e, em seguida, chamada o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: To import XML-based metadata from a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object into [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> objects, pass a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object to the constructor of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> class and call one of the import methods.
trans-unit.target: Para importar baseado em XML de metadados de um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>de objeto para [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>passar objetos, um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objeto para o construtor do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>classe e chamar um dos métodos import.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> class with no dialect, identifier, or XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> classe sem qualquer dialeto, identificador ou XML de metadados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> class using the specified dialect, identifier, and XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> classe com o dialecto especificado, identificador e os metadados XML.

trans-unit.source: Use the MetadataSection constructor to specify the metadata to be included in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, its dialect and its identifier.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o construtor de MetadataSection para especificar os metadados de ser incluídos neste <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, o dialeto e o respetivo identificador.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The metadata object must be serializable using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class so that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> object can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de metadados tem de ser serializável utilizando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe para que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>objeto pode ser serializado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If it is not serializable, an exception is thrown when the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Se não é serializável, é emitida uma exceção quando o objeto está a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> object for the `metadata` parameter if you want to include a reference to the metadata instead of the metadata itself.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>do objeto para o `metadata` parâmetro se pretender incluir uma referência para os metadados em vez dos metadados de si próprio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>

trans-unit.source: The dialect of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto dos metadados.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of XML attributes that you can use to add or remove attributes extensions to the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de atributos XML que pode utilizar para adicionar ou remover as extensões de atributos para os metadados.

trans-unit.source: Use the Attributes property to add or remove attribute extensions.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de atributos para adicionar ou remover as extensões de atributo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The dialect and identifier attributes are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Os atributos de dialeto e o identificador não estão incluídos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection of XML attributes for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de XML de atributos para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de predefinição está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> from the specified policy information.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> das informações de política especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use CreateFromPolicy method to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método CreateFromPolicy para criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>para uma expressão de política de WS-Policy.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> and the `identifier` is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A>e o `identifier` está atribuída a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recommend identifier is the `wsp:Name` attribute for the policy expression.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de Recomendamos é o `wsp:Name` atributo para a expressão de política.

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of a policy as defined in WS-Policy.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação XML de uma política, tal como definido no WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the policy.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para a política.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified policy expression with the specified identifier.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> que contém a expressão de política especificado com o identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: The XML element is not a policy element.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML não é um elemento de política.

trans-unit.source: The policy is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A política é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> de especificado <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this static factory method to quickly create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método de fábrica estático para criar rapidamente um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>para um documento de esquema XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is assigned the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property is assigned the value of the target namespace of the XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>atribuída o valor da propriedade <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>propriedade é atribuída o valor do espaço de nomes de destino do documento de esquema XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Um documento de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> containing the specified XML schema.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> que contém o esquema XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The schema is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O esquema é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> que contenha especificado <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this static factory method to quickly create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método de fábrica estático para criar rapidamente um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>para um documento WSDL.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is assigned the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property is assigned the value of the target namespace of the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>atribuída o valor da propriedade <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>propriedade é atribuída o valor do espaço de nomes de destino do documento WSDL.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> used to create a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> utilizado para criar um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> que contenha especificado <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serviceDescription is .
trans-unit.target: The serviceDescription is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica o tipo de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The dialect indicates the type of metadata in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto indica o tipo de metadados na <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The dialect strings with supported object models are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A>
trans-unit.target: As cadeias de dialeto com os modelos de objeto suportados são:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dialect for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para os metadados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um identificador para os metadados.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the metadata in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para os metadados no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The value depends on the type of metadata.
trans-unit.target: O valor depende do tipo de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contained metadata object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto de metadados contidos.

trans-unit.source: Use the Metadata property to access or modify the metadata content contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de metadados para aceder ou modificar o conteúdo de metadados contidos no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The metadata object can be <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> or a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> as a reference to the metadata content.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de metadados pode ser <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>ou um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>como uma referência para o conteúdo de metadados.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> is deserialized, the type of the metadata object is determined from the XML content.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>é anular a serialização, é determinar o tipo de objeto de metadados do conteúdo XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve os valores de retorno possíveis.

trans-unit.source: |Type of XML metadata|Returned type| |--------------------------|-------------------| |WSDL document|<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>| |XML Schema|<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName>| |Metadata reference|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>| |Metadata location|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>| |Policy, and all other XML content|<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de metadados XML | Devolveu o tipo | |--------------------------|-------------------| | Documento WSDL | <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>| | Esquema XML | <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName>| | Referência de metadados | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>| | Localização de metadados | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>| | Política e outro todo o conteúdo XML | <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The metadata contents for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de metadados para este <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the metadata exchange dialect.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor de dialeto de exchange metadados.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Metadata Exchange document.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para um documento de metadados de WS Exchange.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Metadata Exchange document.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para um documento de metadados de WS Exchange.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the WS-Policy dialect.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor do dialeto de WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para uma expressão de política de WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para uma expressão de política de WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dialect.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor do dialeto da Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: The dialect.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para um documento WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the XML Schema dialect.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor do dialeto de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para um documento de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: O dialecto para um documento de esquema XML.
